tachyon.job

Class CommandLineJob

  • java.lang.Object
    • tachyon.job.Job
      • tachyon.job.CommandLineJob
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class CommandLineJob
extends Job
    A job that wraps a programmed run by command line. This job's caller should ensure the execution environment are identical on master and at the client side.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
